featured.text: A human body usually has a ________ temperature of about 37 degrees C. (A) steady (B) various (C) gradual (D) precious 8.

definition.zh_def: 逐漸的，慢慢的，隨著時間的推移而發生變化的。
definition.en_def: Happening slowly over a period of time; not sudden.
definition.example: The changes in temperature were gradual, making it hard to notice at first.
